summary: Adds another way to finish the quest without killing innocent people.
descriptionHtml:
Did you want to finish the Oghma Infinium quest but always felt bad because you had to slaughter innocent (or not) people ?
Don\'t worry anymore !

If you are an Elf, you can use the Extractor on yourself. Beside that, the extractor can now be used on sleeping people.
To use the extractor on yourself, just go in your inventory and click it.
How amazing is that, uh ?

This mod is compatible with everything and can be uninstalled at wish -but why would you do that ?

[center][youtube]NuGCUUgyF0I[/youtube][/center]
[img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/3/33/Oghma_infinium_1-2.png[/img]
author: Sagittarius22
